reference_summary:
eos Smooth Lip Balm Sphere, Honeysuckle Honeydew 0.25 oz eos ['For the most up to date information, we recommend you visit the manufacturer website for the best product details, including ingredients, hazards, directions and warnings. This product offering is for 1 Retail Package'] {'Brand': 'Eos', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Color': 'Honeysuckle Honeydew', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Softening,Smoothening,Nourishing,Moisturizing', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.6 x 1.6 x 1.8 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1379', 'UPC': '722532139187 892992002298 880961603553 220001195820 892992002403', 'Manufacturer': 'Everready First Aid'} This is by most one of my favorite flavors because it tastes JUST like the fruit. Very sweet but not fruity. It reminds me of when I used to eat the fruit in the summer time. So refreshing and sweet. It's a touch of summer! I have to try not to lick it away when I apply it on my lips. This is by most one of my favorite flavors because it tastes JUST like the fruit SALE! Lighted Makeup Mirror for Travel and Home 10x 1x Vanity Mirror with BONUS Eyebrow Tweezers {'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 4.8 x 2.2 inches; 12 Ounces'} This is an unique mirror. I have yet to see one like this. The mirror came with a standard tweezer. Not the best but can't complain.

It is very well made and high quality. There are two mirrors; enlargement and normal. Very well designed for applying makeup because of light.
A good size. Neither too big or small. Travel friendly and great for those messy desks ;)
Adjustable and very light weigh.

The mirror has 3 slots for batteries. To open the cover on the bottom you have to turn the circular plate.
Three slides for lighting option; top mirror light, and bottom. It's not necessary but totally awesome.
I can't get over this mirror!

Discount received for the mirror for testing and reviewing purpose. All of my reviews are 100% honest and unbiased. Thank you for reading! Woh. Check it out Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo, 8 Fl Oz - Smooths and Repairs - Sulfate Free - Natural - Imported from Morocco by Pure Body Naturals Pure Body Naturals {'Brand': 'Pure Body Naturals', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437736398 646437319751'} I have long black hair and of medium thickness. The length is up to my belly button which is consider very long. It's hard to manage sometimes because I don't like shampoo that weighs my hair down or make them tangled.

This argan oil shampoo smells very good but I prefer something that is not scented with chemicals which are labeled as "parfum"
The scent don't really bother me. The texture is nice and not too thick. Lathers up my hair nicely with a quarter size. Since I have a lot of hair, I have to use a quarter size or more. I scratch and rub my scalp for about 30-50 seconds before I rinse in a bucket. This helps me to clean my hair even better. Instead of just rinse form the shower, which dandruff can still stick in my hair.
I am quite impressed with the result. My hair is not too dry not oily at all but moisturized. It feels silky with some volume and smells great. It's hard to manage sometimes because I don't like shampoo that weighs my hair down or make them ... Seya Beauty Pro Makeup Train Case with Dual Tray Removable & Adjustable Plastic Dividers (Black with Silver Trim) Seya {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '15.3 x 9.5 x 9 inches; 6.05 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'TS04SBKF', 'UPC': '784190959972'} This case is extremely sturdy with a downfall: it's too heavy.
It has these two closures but there is no security because there is no code pad or lock. The trays opens up which adds an organized compartment. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Enjoys hydrating and nourishing lip care products and beauty accessories/tools. Has shown increasing interest in hair care products that enhance manageability and moisture. Recently expanded their collection with a premium makeup brush set, reflecting a focus on both quality and variety in beauty tools.
- **Flavor Sensitivity:** Prefers sweet, fruity flavors that resemble real fruits, alongside subtle, pleasant scents in personal care items.
- **Seasonal Association:** Maintains positive emotional connections to summer and fresh produce, influencing choices across skincare and hair care.
- **Texture Preference:** Values smooth textures and softening benefits in lip care, and appreciates lightweight, non-greasy textures in hair care products.
- **Flavor Complexity:** Enjoys intricate flavor profiles that are sweet but not overwhelmingly fruity, and prefers subtle, natural scents in cosmetics.
- **Brand Affinity:** Loyal to eos for lip care while open to exploring new brands for beauty tools and hair care. Recent acquisition of a brush set demonstrates readiness to try different brands.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Generally satisfied with product performance and remains open to exploring new products. Emphasizes a structured approach to personal care, highlighting usability and effectiveness.
- **Beauty Tool Engagement:** Has enhanced beauty routines with a carefully chosen makeup train case and recently added essential makeup brushes, indicating a commitment to functionality and organization in grooming routines.

The user's preferences reflect a continued focus on quality, sensory experiences, and effective personal care solutions.
